item.title: November 27, 2025, at 3:16:34â€¯PM
item.description: The Orion browser is now officially out of beta, with version 1.0 released. I tested it several times during the beta phase and wanted to revisit it now that it has launched. I installed it yesterday, customized the settings, and will be testing it over the next few days to see if it offers any advantages over Safari.
